HD44780.HELLO: Configure the different lines for the startup message, only four lines allowed.
HD44780.GOODBYE: Configure the different lines for the shutdown message, only four lines allowed.
HD44780.D_SPEED: The scrolling speed of text on the LCD panel.
HD44780.D_ADDRESS: The i2c address, use i2cdetect to find the correct one, most common is 0x27.
HD44780.D_COLUMNS: The number of columns (in total) on the display(s).
HD44780.D_ROWS: The number of rows (in total) on the display(s).
HD44780.D_CHAR_MAP: The character mapping to use on the display, need for certain languages.
HD44780.D_ENABLE_MPDLCD: MPDLCD will populate the LCD with the MPD status.
HD44780.D_DRIVER_PATH: The directory in which the driver is located.
HD44780.D_CONNECTION_TYPE: Connection type used for the LCD screen, either i2c or GPIO.
HD44780.D_DEVIATING_PINS:
Whether your setup differs from the standard GPIO pins:
D7=18
D6=23
D5=24
D4=25
EN=8
EN2=22
RS=7
BL=8
HD44780.GPIO_PIN: The GPIO pin to which this LCD pin connects on the Raspberry Pi.
